implementation.functions: function initialiseMyiPhonePlugin(lul_device) luup.log("MyiPhone: Plugin STARTING-UP!") MyiPhone = require("L_MyiPhone1") NC_MYiPstartUpAppleCheckIn = MyiPhone.startUpAppleCheckIn NC_MYiPrefreshMyiPhoneLocation = MyiPhone.refreshMyiPhoneLocation return MyiPhone.MyiPhoneStartUp(lul_device) end
